About Me

I'm a well experienced Information Technology Executive with more than 8 years of experience in the field of Information communication technology. During my past years I was led an IT team to build personal computers, install operating systems and other software, install peripherals, diagnose errors and faults (software and hardware), repair and replace parts if necessary, and I have successfully managed the development of new products or services to meet customer needs.

And established policies and procedures for customer organization's computing needs, managed operations such as computer networks, hardware, software, and other IT infrastructure to ensure it is functioning properly.
